provider_arguments.info: token - (Required) The DNSimple API token. It must be provided, but it can also be sourced from the DNSIMPLE_TOKEN environment variable. Please note that this must be an API v1 token.
email - (Required) The email associated with the token. It must be provided, but it can also be sourced from the DNSIMPLE_EMAIL environment variable.

arguments.info: domain - (Required) The domain to add the record to
name - (Required) The name of the record
value - (Required) The value of the record
type - (Required) The type of the record
ttl - (Optional) The TTL of the record

attributes.info: name - The name of the record
value - The value of the record
type - The type of the record
ttl - The TTL of the record
priority - The priority of the record
domain_id - The domain ID of the record
hostname - The FQDN of the record
